K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55a-9: chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can dag la yang snying rje chen po skyed par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55a-13: gti mug ces bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55a-14: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i chos cung zad tsam yang dmigs su med pas; byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis mthong ba ltar na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55a-15: sems can rnams ni mtshan ma med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55a-16: rang bzhin gyis stong zhing dben pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55a-17: btags pa tsam du rnam par bzhag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55a-18: tshogs shing 'dus pa'i chos 'di la 'dod chags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55a-20: gti mug skyed par byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-0: bdag gis 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor @55b brtags nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-1: 'dod chags kyis rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du snying rje chen po la gnas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-2: sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-3: chos kyi dbyings las ma g-yos par rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-4: skyes pa gang zhig bud med dag la yang dag pa ma yin pas sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-5: 'dod chags lci ba skyes par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-6: byang chub sems dpas bud med shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa gzugs kyi mtshan khyad par du 'phags pa rin po che'i rgyan phreng dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-7: rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pas lha'i bu mo dang 'dra bar gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-8: sngon ma mthong ba dag tu bsgyur nas sems can de dag gis ji ltar sred cing rjes su chags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-9: shin tu mngon par zhen par gyur pa ston par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-10: de dag gi nus pa dang sbyar nas thabs kyis 'dod chags kyi dug mda' dbyung ba'i ched du rang dbang du gyur pa'i mthus bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-11: de'i mdun du snang bar byas nas chos bstan pa nyid kyis sems can de dag chos kyi dbyings rtogs par byas te mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-12: bud med gang zhig skyes pa dag la 'dod chags kyi sems skyes par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:55b-13: byang chub sems dpas skyes pa'i lus bstan nas 'dod chags kyi dug mda' dbyung ba'i ched du chos bstan pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings la zhugs par byas nas mi snang bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56a-1: thob; 'dod chags kyi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56a-2: spyod pa gzhan de dag kyang gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi sgo mo bye ba stong phrag tshad med pa bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56a-3: sems can rnams kyi sems khong du chud par byas nas thams cad rnam par grol bar gyur kyang bdag gis sems can la 'di lta bu'i chos bstan to snyam du sems pa yang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56a-4: sems can rnam par grol bar gyur pa yang mi dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56a-8: mtsho ma dros pa'i klu'i rgyal po ni las kyi mthu'i dbang gis de'i pho brang gi nang nas chu klung chen po bzhi byung nas sems can chu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56a-9: skam la gnas pa dag dbyar tsha ba'i dus kyi tshe bsil ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56a-10: rlan gyis me tog dang 'bras bu dag rgyas shing 'bru rnams 'phel bar gyur nas sems can mang po shin tu bde bar byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56a-11: klu'i rgyal po de bdag gis chu klung bzhi po 'di dag phyung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56a-12: dbyung bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56b-0: 'on kyang chu klung bzhi po dag rtag tu 'bab cing sems can rnams nye bar spyod par byed do; ;byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i dbang gis rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan @56b nas 'khor ba'i yongs su gdung pa thams cad bsal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56b-1: lha dang mi rnams la 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba sbyin par byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56b-2: byang chub sems dpa' de bdag gis chos bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56b-3: bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56b-4: 'on kyang rang gi ngang gis snying rje chen po'i bsam pa la gnas nas sems can rnams la so sor brtag ste ci rigs par chos ston par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56b-8: brgya byin lha'i dbang po la lha'i bu mo khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod pa de dag brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i rang dbang gi mthu'i dbang gis lus mang po bstan nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56b-9: lha'i bu mo de dag de dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i bde ba yongs su rdzogs par myong bas de dag so so nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56b-10: 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu ni deng lha'i dbang po dang lhan cig rtses so snyam du sems kyang yang dag par lha'i dbang po de la mngon par zhen par gyur pa ci yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56b-11: byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sems can gang yongs su bzla ba'i 'os su gyur pa de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56b-12: byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par zhen par gyur pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:56b-17: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ri mthon po'i rtse mo la shar ba'i tshe 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu snang bar byed pas gang du snang bar byas pa'i gnas de dag tu kha dog sngon po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57a-2: dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu ston par byed kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de ni kha dog gcig pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57a-3: 'od gcig pa nyid de tha dad pa'i mtshan ma med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57a-4: byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings snang bar byas nas sems can gyi mngon par zhen pa'i ri'i rtse mo de dag tu shar ba na dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur cing de dag gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57a-6: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57a-7: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57a-8: bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag pa sems can rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du lus tshad med pa bstan nas tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57a-13: gser yang dag pa ni mgar ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i mthu'i dbang gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs su byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57a-14: mtshan nyid tha dad par gyur kyang gser gyi rang bzhin la ni tha dad du gyur pa ci yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-0: byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du @57b chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par brtags nas sems can mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du lus tshad med pa dag bstan nas tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la ni gnyis su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-1: 'di ni rtag par chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-2: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di lta bu thob par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-3: sems can gyi ched du rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas chos ston par byed pa de dag gis chos thos pa'i dbang gis 'phags pa'i nor phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug dang ldan par gyur pas 'khor ba'i rgud pa dag gtan du yongs su spong bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-8: sems can rnams ni nga rgyal dang mtshungs par ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-9: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-10: bdag dang bdag gi mtshan ma la gnas pas yun ring po nas byams pa dang bzod pa ma bsgoms pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-11: zhe sdang gi gdung bas rang gi sems bshig par gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-12: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rjes su dran par ma gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-13: zhe sdang gi gdug pas g-yogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-14: chos nyid la rmongs par gyur pa yin yang byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang mang ba'i sems can de dag la nam yang gnod sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:57b-15: rnam par 'tshe ba skyed par mi byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-0: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni gti mug @58a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-1: gi rmongs pas chos rnams gzod ma nyid nas rab tu dben zhing zhi ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-2: dri ma dang rnyog pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-5: rab tu dben pa'i chos nyid la phyin ci log dang mtshungs par ldan par gyur pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa rgyas par gyur to snyam du sems pa kho nar zad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-6: de snyam du bsams nas kyang snying rje chen po la gnas te rtag par bdag nyid 'gyod cing bshags par yang byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-7: gal te lus kyi yan lag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-8: nying lag gcod pa zhig yod na yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-9: zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can de dag 'dul bar 'dod pa'i phyir bzod pa la rab tu gnas par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-10: gal te zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can tshad med pa de dag phan tshun gcig la gcig rgyab kyis phyogs shing zhe sdang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-11: khon du 'dzin pa'i las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang gis sprul gdug pa ngan 'gro'i lus su ltung bar gyur pa dag la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-12: byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa la rab tu gnas pa des 'di ltar byams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-13: dran pa'i stobs kyis sems can de dag btul nas ngan 'gro'i rnam par smin pa len par mi 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58a-14: gdon mi za bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa yongs su bsal ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58b-1: byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te sems can zhe sdang can dag mthong bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58b-2: 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58b-3: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni zhe sdang gi rjes su 'brangs nas yang dag pag ma yin pas rnam par rtog pa bskyed nas mnyam zhing rtsod pa med pa'i chos nyid 'di la zhe sdang gi bsam pa bskyed pas sems can 'di dag chos kyi dbyings nyid ma rtogs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58b-4: gal te sems can 'di dag chos nyid mthong bar gyur na ni gzhan dag la gnod sems bskyed par mi 'gyur ba zhig na chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ma rtogs pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58b-5: de'i phyir zhe sdang skyes par gyur to zhes byang chub sems dpa' des zhe sdang mang ba'i sems can de dag la lhag par snying brtse ba bskyed nas snying rje chen po la gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58b-6: sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed la rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis sems can gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir chos kyi sgo mo rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par byed kyang bdag gis sems can gyi zhe sdang bsal ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam du mi sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58b-8: byang chub sems dpas chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:58b-9: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid la gnas nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa rab tu bsal ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59a-3: mun pa bsal nas snang ba 'thob par 'gyur yang mun pa sel bar byed pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59a-5: snang ba'i ngo bo nyid nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing dbyer med pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59a-6: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i ye shes de la brten nas thabs mkhas pas chos bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59a-7: zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul zhing zhi bar byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la tha dad du gyur pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59a-11: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar nas 'od kyis gang dang gang du snang bar byas pa de dag thams cad ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis bsdus pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59a-12: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang zhe sdang gi spyod pa gdul zhing bsal ba'i phyir ji tsam du brjod pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo yin yang chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59a-13: 'di ltar zhe sdang gi spyod pa nyid khri chig stong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59a-14: spyod pa gzhan rtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes yongs su grub pas sems can de dag gi zhe sdang gi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su chos ston par byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59a-15: bdag gis sems can la chos bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-0: ston par 'gyur @59b ro snyam du sems pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-1: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-2: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-4: bskal pa las lhag par sems can gyi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su tshig 'bru dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-6: brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-7: zhe sdang spyod pa'i mtha' rnyed par mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-8: byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-9: spobs pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-10: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji ltar bu zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di ni shin tu dkar ba'i dngos po yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-16: 'di ltar sems can rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba gzhan la gnod par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-17: ma rig pa'i mngal gyi sgo ngas kun du dkris pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-18: dar gyi srin bu bzhin du bdag nyid bcings pas chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i thabs med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-19: bya ba dag la legs par so sor mi rtog pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:59b-20: bdag tu lta ba la mngon par zhen pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-2: nges par 'byung bar dka' ba yin pas 'di lta bu la sogs pas rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can dag gi ched du dang po sems bskyed pa nas sbyor ba chen po bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-3: ngal zhing sdug bsngal ba yang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-4: le lo yang med par rkyen gang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-6: chos bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis sems can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la btsud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-7: rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sngon chos kyi dbyings legs par so sor brtag par rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis snying rje chen po la gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-9: sems can de dag chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur par rig nas ci nus ci lcogs kyis chos bstan nas rab tu dul bar byed kyang bdag gis chos bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-11: ston par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-12: 'on kyang de sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba legs par so sor brtags nas rang gi ngang gis chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-13: sems can de dag gi ma rig pa'i las kyi 'du byed bsal nas rnam par grol ba 'thob par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-17: sman pa bzang po nad mang po gso ba la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-18: sngar sman dpyad rnams la shin tu goms par gyur pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60a-19: nad kyi mtshan ma mthong ma thag tu sngags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-0: sman btang ba thams cad @60b rab tu rtogs par gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-1: des gsos pa gang yang mi sos pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-2: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par rtogs pas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis gti mug gi spyod pa bsags pa'i sems can de dag gi dbang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-3: rang bzhin ji ltar bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan nas thams cad rab tu gsal bar rtogs par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-5: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-6: byang chub sems dpa' gang gi gter 'di thob par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-7: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu legs par so sor brtags nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-8: gti mug spyod pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du bskal pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-9: bskal pa las lhag par de dag gi rang bzhin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-10: 'dun pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshig 'bru dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-12: brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-13: gti mug spyod pa'i mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-14: byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-15: spobs pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-16: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-17: 'di ltar gti mug gi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:60b-18: spyod pa gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61a-1: yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos kyi sgo mo brgyad stong du ma rab tu phye nas yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i gtig mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61a-8: me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag cing yongs su gsal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61a-9: dri ma med pa lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag na gzugs brnyan rnams der snang zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61a-10: 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de bdag gis gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag ston par byed do zhes mi sems mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61a-11: 'on kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de shin tu byi dor legs par byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61a-12: gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61a-13: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings kyi me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu legs par byi dor byas pa rtsol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgyad stong du ma rnam par phye ste bstan nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61a-14: de dag thams cad rab tu rtogs shing rnam par grol ba thob par byas kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61a-16: sems can gyi mtshan ma skyed par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-0: byang chub sems dpa' des chos kyi dbyings kyi @61b mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa'i phyir dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-1: spyod pa bzhi po 'di dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas de dag gi dbang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-2: rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-4: sems can gyi khams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtogs par byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-5: gnyis su 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid kyang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-7: sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag gnyis su med cing tha dad pa med par gsal bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-11: nam mkha' la ni tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma yang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-12: rnam par gzhag pa yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-13: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par so sor brtags nas chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu 'jug par rtogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-14: sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-15: chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-17: cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa 'di la nyi khri chig stong yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-18: spyod pa gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-19: byang chub sems dpas so sor brtags nas thams cad gsal bar rtogs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:61b-22: sman pa mkhas pa nad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-0: sman gtong ba rab tu shes pa bzhin du rtsol @62a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-1: ba med pa'i ye shes kyis chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-3: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-4: sems can rnams kyi ched du bskal pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-5: bskal pa las lhag par de dag mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-6: spyod pa de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-7: byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-8: spobs pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-9: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-10: bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-13: byang chub sems dpa' des de lta bu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-14: sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-16: bsam pa yang thabs mkhas pas rab tu rtogs pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-17: gal te 'dod chags mang ba'i sems can mthong bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-18: de dag rab tu gdul zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62a-19: de dag gi nad gso ba'i phyir so so'i skye bo dang mthun par 'dod pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-0: khyim gyi so tshigs phun sum tshogs pa ston @62b par byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-1: padma bzhin du des gos shing mngon par zhen par gyur pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-2: sems can gang gti mug cing blo dang mi ldan pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-3: byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa mi shes pas; 'di snyam du blo dang ldan pa su zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-4: so so'i skye bo dang tha mi dad par 'dod pa rnams nyams su len par byed ces byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di ni byang chub spangs pa yin no snyam du sems par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-5: sems can de lta bu de dag ni sems yongs su mi gtsang ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-6: zhe sdang chen po skyes nas gus par mi 'gyur bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-7: las de'i dbang gis lus zhig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-8: shi ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar gyur na yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-9: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' shin tu gsang bas gdul ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam pa yongs su zad nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-10: gdon mi za bar mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa la rab tu 'god par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-14: me rab tu 'bar ba ni rtsva dang shing dang phrad par gyur pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-15: thams cad rab tu 'bar zhing me'i phung po nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-16: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi me 'bar bar gyur pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-17: sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-19: gti mug dang; dge ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-20: mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig 'grogs shing thams cad rab tu 'bar nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:62b-21: shes rab nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-1: byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-5: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-7: rin po che sna bzhi las mngon par grub pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-8: sems can rnams kyang de'i rjes su kha dog sngon po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-11: dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur bar byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-12: gal te bee d'urya'i ngos su phyin na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-13: thams cad kyang bee d'urya'i kha dog gcig pa nyid du 'gyur bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-14: gser gyi kha dog gi ngos su phyin na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-15: thams cad gser gyi kha dog nyid du 'gyur bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-17: chu shel gyi kha dog tu gyur pa yang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-18: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ma 'dres pa'i chos thob pas sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-22: mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i thad du phyin cing lhan cig 'grogs par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-23: thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur bar byed kyang de'i sems mi gtsang zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-24: rang gi sdig pa'i las kyi dbang gis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-26: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du lhung bar gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63a-27: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i yon tan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-0: smon lam @63b gyi stobs kyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam par smin pa zad pa'i 'og tu gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur pa la 'god par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-2: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-4: grangs med pa na snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa; bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-6: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-7: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i phung po yon tan gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-9: de'i tshe skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-10: da ltar nga ji lta ba bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-11: de'i tshe sems can rnams 'dod chags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-13: gti mug shin tu che ste; nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pas pha ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-15: grogs po'i yid dang 'gal bar byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-17: slob dpon gyi rjes su mi 'brang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-18: byas pa drin du mi gzo ba; rtag bar gnod sems dang bcas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-20: rku ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-21: phan tshun gcig la gcig gnod par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-22: tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-25: dge 'dun la gus pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:63b-26: ser snas zil gyis non pas yi dvags kyi chos spyod pa'i sems can de lta bu sha stag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas par gyur pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-2: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus dus ngan pa de'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-4: bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos chen po'i tshogs ni nyi khri nyis stong mnga' bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-5: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rgya cher byin pa zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-6: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems shin tu dang bar gyur pa zhig yod pa des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par dbyar zla ba gsum spyan drangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-8: mchod pa rgya cher bshams nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-9: mchod cing rim gro byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-10: de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-11: chos ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pas 'khor mang po rnams nyan par spro ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-12: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la rtag par ngal ba med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-13: re ba med par chos ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-14: mdog gsal zhing gsong por smra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-15: gzugs dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-16: byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-17: sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mos shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-20: bla mar byed cing bsngags pa brjod pa zhig yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64a-21: dge slong gsar bu dag kyang rtag par dri ma med pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-0: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'byung zhing 'jug pa dag la thogs pa med @64b par gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-5: na ba'i gsos sman rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang rim gro byas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-6: de'i tshe 'khor mang po de las dge slong phal cher lus kyi sdom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-7: sems kyi shes rab bsgom pa mi shes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-10: dge 'dun la gus pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-13: bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos la skur ba 'debs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-15: rnam par g-yeng zhing gdul dka' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-16: dbang po rnams mi sdom pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-17: chos bzhin ma yin pa la gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-18: dge sbyong gi tshul med par bdag nyid dge sbyong du khas 'che ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-21: yid kyi las thams cad log par bzhugs pa sha stag gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-22: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de dbyar 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-23: rgyal po rgya cher byin pas tsan dan dmar pos sku zhugs la bzhen nas mchod pa byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-24: ring bsrel gyi mchod rten ngos bzhi kun tu tsan dan dmar po'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-25: padma gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-26: bye ba phrag brgyad cu brtsigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-27: de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa ni bcom ldan 'das des mang du thos pa'i mchog tu lung bstan pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:64b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos rgya cher spel te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-0: grong rdal gang dang gang du song ba der sems @65a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-1: can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed yongs su btul nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-3: de'i tshe dge slong sdig can mang po rnal 'byor khong du ma chud pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-4: rtag par phrag dog dang bcas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-5: bdud kyis bslus pa rnams rgyal po de ga la ba der dong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-6: 'di skad du rgyal pos bkur ba'i dge slong dri ma med pa ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thags thogs ma mchis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-7: dge slong ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma lags la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-8: dus ma lags par yang zas 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-9: spos dang phreng ba dag gis kyang lus brgyan par bgyis pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-10: yang dag par tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pas mchod pa mdzad pa mi rigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-11: bdag cag ni don 'di'i slad du 'dir mchis nas rgyal po la gsol ba lags kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-12: slad kyis 'gyod par yang ma mdzad cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-13: sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i bstan pa la thugs mi ches pa yang mi bskyed du gsol zhes smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-14: de'i tshe bdud sdig can zhes bya ba zhig kyang bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su bsgyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-15: rgyal po de ga la ba der song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-16: snga ma bzhin du smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65a-17: de'i tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin pas yang dang yang du de skad smras pa thos kyang 'di snyam du dge slong dri ma med pa ni rab tu brtson zhing blo dang ldan pas bdag gis bla mar bkur ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-0: dngos po 'di lta bu byed pa ni @65b ga nas med do snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-1: de nas de'i tshe bdud kyi 'khor rnams par snang las lus phyed bstan nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-2: rgyal po de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-3: rgyal po bzo yi sgyu rtsal slobs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-4: dus tshod dag la mkhas par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-5: rgyal pos de ni ma shes na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-6: mi rgyal rtags dang ldan ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-7: sangs rgyas nyan thos dgra bcom pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-8: ye shes chen po ldan pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-9: tshig dag la ni mi rten par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-10: ci yi phyir na chad par lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-11: dge slong rnams ni phan gdags phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-12: khyod la bden tshigs smras pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-14: yang dag tshangs spyod ma yin pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-15: de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-16: btsun mo dag dang lhan cig rtse //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-17: rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-18: legs par rtogs la the tshom sol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-19: rgyal pos dngos po 'di thos pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-20: sems la skrag cing mya ngan skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-21: 'khor rnams dang ni lhan cig tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-22: myur zhing rings par pho brang dong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-23: de tshe dri med pho brang nang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-24: chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-25: bdag dang sems can med pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-26: dam pa'i don ni ston par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-27: rgyal po dmag 'khor bcas pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-28: thams cad bdud kyis bslus pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-29: pho brang nang gi btsun mo rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-30: dge slong yongs bskor mthong ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-31: zhe sdang glang chen myos 'dra bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-32: gshed ma dag la rab bsgo ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-33: dge slong nga yi btsun mo bslus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-34: sdug bsngal chos kyi chad pas chod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-35: blon po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:65b-36: thams cad bdud kyis zin pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-2: sems kyis gnod ba bya bar bsams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-3: gshed ma mtshon thogs 'ongs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-4: dri med snying brtse mchi ma byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-5: rgyal pos khyod ni chos min na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-6: ci yi phyir na mchi ma byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-7: dri med rgyal po la smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-8: dngos po 'di ni yid ches dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-9: re zhig skad cig sdod cig dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-10: bdag ni bsad pa'i long yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-11: rgyal pos dge slong tshig thos na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-12: gshed ma dag la sdod cig bsgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-13: bden pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-14: khyod kyis myur du smra ba'i rigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-15: lhag pa'i bsam pa ldan 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-17: sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-18: bden pa'i tshig ni 'di skad smras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-19: rgyal po chen po mkhyen par mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-20: gal te yang dag nyes med na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-21: sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-22: mkha' la me tog char phob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-23: de skad tshig 'di smras ma thag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-24: sa chen rnam pa drug tu g-yos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-25: mkha' la lha yi me tog babs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-26: bdud 'khor mya ngan skyes par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-27: de tshe rgyal po dang ba skyes; ;rkang la phyag byas bzod par gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-28: bdag ni dmyal bar lhung 'gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-29: mgon med bdag la skyabs mdzod cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-30: kyi hud sdig pa'i grogs phrad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-31: gdug pa'i sems ni skyes par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-32: sdig pa'i grogs po'i rjes 'brang nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-33: mgon dang skyabs byed su yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-34: ston pa chen po ma gtogs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66a-35: phyogs bcur bdag gi mgon byed med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-0: bdag gis @66b rgyal srid spangs nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-1: nam 'tsho'i bar du skyabs su mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-2: dge slong des ni rgyal po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-3: g-yog 'khor bsam pa rig gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-4: dam pa'i don ni rab tu bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-5: rgyal pos thos nas dad pa thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-6: 'khor ni bye ba brgya stong dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-7: rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-8: sbyangs pa'i sdom pa blangs pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-9: gzhan gyis mgron gnyer yong mi len //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-10: de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang nang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-11: btsun mo 'khor bcas brgyad khri rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-12: dam pa'i don ni thos pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-13: phyir mi ldog la gnas par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-14: rgyal pos sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-15: lo ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-16: nyin mtshan rtag par sdig bshags kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-17: 'on kyang sdig pa'i las ma zad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-18: lo ni bye mang sdug bsngal myong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-19: sdig zad de bzhin gshegs dang phrad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-20: sngon ni skrag par byas pa'i rgyus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-21: rnam smin lhag ma rtag par smin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-22: mthar gyis rnal 'byor rab bsgoms te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-23: sangs rgyas bye ba stong mchod nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-24: so sor zhing khams gzhan dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-25: thams cad mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-26: thams cad kun dang mtshan mthun par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-27: yon tan grags pa zhes byar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-28: de tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-29: dge slong byams bzod de la ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-30: gdug pa'i sems ni bskyod pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-31: lo ni bye ba mang por yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-32: sngon gyi sdig las mngon gyur pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-34: rnam smin de ni zad nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:66b-35: slar yang mi lus thob gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-2: rtag tu bsnyen bkur rim gro byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-3: gzhan yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-4: brgyad cu dag la rim gro byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-5: de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-6: de ni nga bdag nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-7: chos smra nyes pa med pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-8: gnod pa byas pa'i dge slong ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-10: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-11: de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang nang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-12: btsun mo'i 'khor ni brgyad khri rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-13: shin tu dang bas dge rtsa bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-14: sangs rgyas tshad med rim gro byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-15: de ltar spyod pa rab bskyed nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-16: sems can phan gdags smon lam gdab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-17: sangs rgyas bye ba stong mchod nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-18: so sor mngon par 'tshang yang rgya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-19: ngas deng khyod la bsgo ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-20: thams cad gnod sems ma bskyed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-21: gang gis byams bsgoms sangs rgyas bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-22: myur du byang chub chen po thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-25: sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-27: bsam pa dag la mi mkhas pa dag gis dus thams cad du gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-31: ri rnams kyi nang na ri rab mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na mchog dang; gtso bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67a-32: bla na med par gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67b-0: chu bo thams cad kyi nang na rgya mtsho mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye @67b shes rnams kyi nang na mchog tu zab cing rgya che bar gyur ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67b-4: rgyal po rnams kyi nang na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mchog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67b-6: bla mar gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na gong na med par gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67b-10: gti mug spyod pa'i sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67b-11: sems las byung ba 'jug cing 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67b-12: se gol gtogs pa gcig la thams cad yongs su sdud mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pas; 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67b-16: skyes bu mig dang ldan pas rtsol ba la mi ltos par rang gi lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing the tshom med pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa ji snyed pa dag rab tu mkhyen pas 'khor mang po'i nang du chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:67b-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68a-2: don med par dus las 'da' bar byed pa yang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68a-3: 'dod chags kyis gdungs pas lus dang ngag gi las rnam pa sna tshogs slong bar byed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68a-4: zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can de dag zhe sdang gi zil gyis non pas gcig la gcig zhe sdang gis phrag dog byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68a-5: gnod pa byas pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68a-6: gti mug spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can rnams ma rig pa'i mun nag gis bsgribs shing rmongs pas mngon par zhen pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68a-7: log par lta ba'i rjes su 'brang ba la mos par gyur ba dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68a-10: 'phel zhing rtsol ba dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68a-11: ldog cing nyams par gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68a-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68a-14: nyan thos kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 'khor mang po'i nang du zhugs nas sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu mkhyen pas gal te dus la ma bab par rig par gyur na ni cang mi gsung zhing gtang snyoms su bzhag @68b nas; sems can 'di dag ni chos la rmongs par gyur pas khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbang po dang stobs khyad par du 'phags pa phun sum tshogs shing dus rab tu mkhyen pa'i phyir 'dul ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68b-2: bsam pa mchog tu gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68b-3: bzod par nus pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68b-4: tshig legs par nyan par gyur pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68b-5: de ltar mkhyen par gyur nas kyang sems can de dag yongs su sdud cing phan 'dogs par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68b-8: byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yang dag pa'i gnas skabs su ma zhugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68b-9: sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa legs par khong du ma chud pa dag gis khyim na gnas pa'am rab tu byung ba yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68b-10: thams cad kun la smod cing gnod sems bskyed nas yun ring por bdag nyid la gnod par 'gyur bar mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68b-11: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas theg pa chen po la gnas pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:68b-12: sems can gzhan dag sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byed pa mthong na yang gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69a-0: de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu sems can gang rnam par dkar zhing yongs su dag pa'i chos las cung zad cig nyams par gyur na nam yang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mi 'gyur @69a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69a-2: byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can mthong bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69a-3: sems can 'di dag 'dod chags kyi gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa yang bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69a-4: zhe sdang dang gti mug gi gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa de dag mthong na yang 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69a-6: bdag gis sems can thams cad na ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan par gyur pa dag mthong bar gyur na sman yongs su btsal te thabs mkhas pas yongs su gso ba'i rigs pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69a-7: bdag sngon sems can gyi nad bsal bar yid dam bcas na deng yal bar bor ba 'di nyid bdag gi nyes pa yin no snyam du sems pas so; ;byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bdag nyid kyi nyes pa la lta zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69a-8: sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems skyed par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69a-9: gal te gsod pa 'am lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gcod cing btub pa zhig dang phrad par gyur na yang pha rol gnod pa byed pa de dag la lan bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69a-11: byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yang dag par bsgom pa na 'das pa'i mi dge ba'i las ji snyed pa dag kyang gtan du zad cing ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-0: ma 'ongs pa'i mi dge ba rnams @69b ni yang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-2: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi yang ches snga rol na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-4: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-5: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-6: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-7: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog tu skyes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'od zer can zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-9: rgyal po'i grong khyer rab tu bde ba zhes bya ba'i tshal na bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-10: de'i tshe bshan pa 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba khro gtum che ba gsod pa la dga' zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-11: bzod pa dang byams pa'i sems med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-12: lag pa khrag gis bskus pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-13: mthong ba thams cad skrag par 'gyur ba zhig yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-14: de'i tshe bshan pa des glang zhig khang pa'i nang du bcings te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-15: nang du zhugs nas gsod par byas pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-16: glang des de mthong nas shin tu skrag pas thag pa bcad de bros nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa bzhugs pa'i tshal ga la ba der song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-18: de'i tshe bshan pa de yang mtshon thogs nas phyi bzhin bsnyegs pas glang de skrag nas g-yang sa zab mo zhig tu lhung nas srog chad la thug pa tsam du na zhing sdug bsngal bas sgra phyung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:69b-19: de'i tshe bshan pas glang de mthong nas zhe sdang cher skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-0: g-yang sa zab mo de nyid du zhugs @70a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-1: nas mtshon thogs te gsad par byas pa las mtshon ma btab pa'i bar skabs su /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-2: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa tshal der 'khor mang po brgya stong tshad med pas yongs su bskor ba dag la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-3: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-4: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-5: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-6: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-7: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-8: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-9: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-10: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-11: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-12: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-13: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-19: de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig go zhes rgya cher rnam par phye ste ston par mdzad pas; glog thob /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-20: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di la ma rig pa yang 'du byed la mi sems mi rtog la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-21: 'du byed kyang ma rig pa la mi sems mi rtog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-22: de bzhin du skye ba yang rga shi la mi sems mi rtog pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-23: de ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dmigs su med pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70a-25: bdag dang bdag gi med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-0: rang bzhin gyis rnam @70b par dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-1: phan tshun gcig gis gcig mi rig pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-2: so so'i skye bo rnams 'di lta bu'i chos ma thob pa'i phyir gzugs ni bdag yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-3: bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-4: gzugs ni bdag gi yin no zhes 'dzin par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-8: rnam par shes pa'i bar la yang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-9: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis mi rtag pa la rtag par 'dzin par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-10: sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'dzin par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-11: mi sdug pa la sdug par 'dzin par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-12: bdag med pa la bdag gir 'dzin cing phyin ci log bzhi bskyed par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-13: phyin ci log tu lta ba'i phyir ma rig pas rmongs nas yang dag par tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-14: sems kyi rjes su mngon par zhen par gyur pas srid pa'i sred pa 'ching ba gcod par mi nus shing 'khor ba'i 'khor bar rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor bar gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-15: mkhas pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu legs par rtogs par byed pa'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-17: sems can zhes bya ba nas srog ces bya ba'i bar du cung zad tsam yang yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-23: gnod par byed pa dag kyang mi dmigs so zhes gsungs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:70b-25: de'i tshe bshan pa 'jigs su rung bas rgyang nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-0: de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa'i sgra thos nas @71a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-1: go bar gyur pas de ma thag tu gsod pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-2: mtshon cha spangs te g-yang sa nas byung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-3: bcom ldan 'das de ga la ba der song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs nas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-5: bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-7: bdag ni deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-10: dge slong legs par 'ongs sam zhes gsungs ma thag tu dge slong gi dngos por gyur nas bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pas de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas mthar gyis yongs su smin par mdzad nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'jigs su rung ba thos nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-13: glang de yang de bzhin gshegs pa des rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i gsung sgra shin tu gya nom pa thos nas sems la rab tu dga' ba skyes pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-14: shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas su skyes nas tha mar byams pa dang phrad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71a-15: yang dag pa'i dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-0: @71b de ltar na sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni shin tu zab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-1: rnam par rig par dka' zhing shes par dka' ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-4: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-5: sems can gyi dbang po dang spyod pa dag la shin tu mkhas par byas nas sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-6: thogs pa med pa'i sems la rab tu gnas te chos thams cad la rtag tu mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-7: ci 'dod pa rnams yongs su spangs te tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsgrub par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-8: bzod pa la gnas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-11: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-12: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la so sor brtag par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-14: byang chub sems dpa' gang chos drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-15: ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-17: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten nas mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-19: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi gter gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:71b-21: byang chub sems dpas gzugs thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-1: ma nyid nas skye ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-2: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa mthong ba gang yin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-3: byang chub sems dpa' ni gzugs la mkhas pa thob pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-6: don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-7: chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-8: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang; spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-9: de la don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gzugs kyi don rnams la thogs pa med par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-10: gzugs kyi don gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-11: 'di lta ste; don dam pa gang yin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-12: don dam pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-14: gzugs dmigs su med pa gang yin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-15: don dam pa'i ye shes la 'di lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-16: chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni gzugs kyi chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-17: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72a-18: gzugs rnams la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi thabs la mkhas pas nges pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72b-0: spobs pa so so yang dag par @72b rig pa ni 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72b-1: gzugs kyi chos rnams sems can gyi dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye ste ston par byed kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72b-2: byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas gzugs kyi chos la rmongs shing mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang; 'dun pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis ci rigs par chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la mtshan nyid gnyis su gyur pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72b-7: chos kyi bar du yang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72b-9: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi gter zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72b-10: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na spyod yul rnams la rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu dag yongs su gdul bar 'dod pa'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72b-11: de dag gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag re re la yang bskal pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72b-12: bskal pa las lhag par tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs la mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:72b-13: byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab la yang 'grib pa med cing chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'gal bar gnyis su med cing dbyer med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-0: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas chos thams @73a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-1: cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pas 'thob pa'i chos kyi gter zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-2: chos kyi gter 'dis sems can dag la ci rigs par chos bstan nas zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi gter phun sum tshogs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-3: 'khor ba'i rgyud pa gtan du spong ba gang yin pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gter chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-6: zad mi shes pa'i gter dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-7: kun tu zad mi shes pa'i gter dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-8: mtha' med pa'i gter rnam pa lnga zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-9: byang chub sems dpa' gang gter 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur na yong tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir tshegs chung dus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-10: chos kyi gter bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glog thob ni gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-11: byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni glog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-12: lha'i bu sum khri drug stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du rtsol ba ma mchis pa'i ye @73b shes zhes gang gsungs pa de'i don ji lta bu lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73b-2: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis dge ba'i chos rnams la lus dang sems kyi rjes su mthun par dmigs shing mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73b-3: byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang sems rab tu dul bar gyur nas dran pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73b-4: gnas pa med pa; rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bar gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73b-5: de sngon gyi smon lam dang ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams su rnam pa sna tshogs su ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings las g-yo ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73b-6: rtag tu chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi mtshan ma cung zad tsam yang med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73b-7: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can gang yang yongs su bzlas pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyangs kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73b-9: rtag par sangs rgyas rnams rjes su dran par byed kyang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du mi lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:73b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu rgyu bar byed kyang chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'bral gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74a-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir @74a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74a-1: sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang gang byas pa de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74a-2: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes 'di bstan pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74a-3: brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang bcas te steng gi bar snang las me tog man da rab ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74a-8: tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par phab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74a-9: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74a-10: lha'i rnga rnams kyang rang sgra byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74a-11: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang kun tu snang bar byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74a-12: sems can gang la reg par gyur pa de'i lus kyang shin tu bsil bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' glog thob la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74a-15: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74a-16: ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe yang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsungs bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams @74b tshad med grangs med pa dag na da ltar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i phyir 'od zer chen po 'gyed par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-1: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag ba gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-2: bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-4: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-5: bdag gis ji ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-8: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-9: chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-10: khyod kyis de ltar yang ming yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-12: byang chub sems dpa' glog thob dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-13: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-15: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:74b-16: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:75a-0: mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa'i le'u zhes @75a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-002:75a-1: bya ba ste 'dus pa nyi shu ba rdzogs so //
